# LOG2E

> Base 2 logarithm of the mathematical constant [_e_][eulers-number].

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var LOG2E = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/float64-log2-e' );
```

#### LOG2E

Base 2 logarithm of the mathematical constant [_e_][eulers-number].

```javascript
var bool = ( LOG2E === 1.4426950408889634 );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

<section class="examples">

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

```javascript
var LOG2E = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/float64-log2-e' );

console.log( LOG2E );
// => 1.4426950408889634
```

</section>
